channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
I found an opensource client and started to edit it! You can find it here: [url=http://84.194.118.213:8080/whitescape/forum/viewtopic.php?t=124]http://84.194.118.213:8080/whitescape/forum/viewtopic.php?t=124[/url]
----- Question 1 ----- Know I changed almost every text to the orginal RuneScape loader. But I don't want that people can choose wich server they want to play. They must play on my server. How can I do that?
----- Question 2 ----- How can I change the font color of SoulScape is loading - please wait... (above the loading bar) and the font color of the text in de loading bar. I can edit the color of the text when the loading is done but not other text!

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“nueb35, post:4, topic:4371”][quote author=gred22 link=topic=5657.msg2880158#msg2880158 date=1248292264]
This will come in handy
[/quote]

i think its because when new people join the forum, every post shows up as a new post, maybe some one can change that? and make it so that posts from 2006 dont show up in the front page of a section?[/quote]
No, they are still buried many, many pages deep.
The real reason is that they are moronic fucktards who actually live in a totally separate dimension from the rest of us. A dimension without any concept of time, or what a useful post is. Its quite an interesting phenomenon.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“test123, post:1, topic:4371”]I found an opensource client and started to edit it! You can find it here: http://84.194.118.213:8080/whitescape/forum/viewtopic.php?t=124

----- Question 1 -----
Know I changed almost every text to the orginal RuneScape loader. But I don’t want that people can choose wich server they want to play. They must play on my server. How can I do that?[/quote]

Search for

public final URL getCodeBase()

in the client.

You should see:

public final URL getCodeBase() { if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://"+aString1174+":" + (80 + anInt958));

Change:

 return new URL("http://"+aString1174+":" + (80 + anInt958));

To

 return new URL("yourserverhere":" + (80 + anInt958));

[code]
----- Question 2 -----
How can I change the font color of SoulScape is loading - please wait… (above the loading bar) and the font color of the text in de loading bar.
I can edit the color of the text when the loading is done but not other text!
[/quote]

Text in the Runescape client is in this format:

(0xffffff, "Loading - please wait.", 23693, 150, 256);

The “0xfffff” is a hex code for the color. Hex colors:
http://www.december.com/html/spec/color.html

Now if you’ve looked at all the text in the client and haven’t found what your looking for, keep looking, it’s just obfuscated somehow ;).[/code]

Read full topic
